Name: Amulet
Description: A crudely fashioned tyet amulet in a dark blue glazed faience. It is pierced through the back. The amulet is in the form of an open loop of material from the lower part of which hang two other lengths of the cloth. This was a funerary amulet and invested with the protective powers of Isis, it is often called the 'girdle of Isis'. It was usually placed on the upper part of the mummy.
